Utils¶

Utils is a small library of utility functions compiled for personal needs. There’s nothing too fancy nor anything you can’t find from another library. Utils consists of smaller functions to be used rather than relying on larger packages.

Right now, this package is very small and only includes function to determine a computer’s operating system. Hopefully it will be expanded in the future.

Install¶

You can install this project directly from Github via:

pip3.7 install git+https://github.com/kelmore5/python-sub-utilities.git

Dependencies¶

  • Python 3.7

Import¶

Once installed, you can import the main class like so:

>>> from kelmore__utils import Utils
>>>
>>> Utils.os.is_linux()     # True / False
>>> Utils.os.is_mac()       # True / False
>>> Utils.os.is_windows()   # True / False
.
.
.

Documentation¶

  • Main

  • Utils

Personal Note¶

Utils is only on Github because I reference it in other projects. I don’t have any plans to maintain this project, but I will update it from time to time.
